text:
The JNDI Resources How-To section on JTA UserTransactions at 
http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.0-doc/jndi-resources-howto.html is 
incorrect and incomplete. Have a look at my JGuru comments at 
http://www.jguru.com/faq/view.jsp?EID=531070 for details.

I suggest to fix the sample application code and add instructions on how to 
configure XA-capable Tyrex DataSources in server.xml. It does work - so it's a 
shame that how to enable it is so hard to find out.

Furthermore, a clarification on Tyrex releases would help. Tomcat 4.0.4 
includes Tyrex 0.9.7 which cannot be replaced with Tyrex 1.0 because of 0.9.7-
specific code in org.apache.naming.factory.TyrexDataSourceFactory. Is migration 
to Tyrex 1.0 already planned?
creator: juergen.hoeller@infoniqa.com
remm@apache.org
text:
Tomcat 4.1.7 includes Tyrex 1.0 support, as well as better Tyrex documentation.
http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.1-doc/jndi-datasource-examples-howto.html

This will not be fixed in Tomcat 4.0.x.
